channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'This job sucks,' DHS lawyer says in hearing over ICE's judicial orders response
item.description: “A court order is not advisory, and it is not conditional,” U.S. District Court Judge Jerry Blackwell said.

item.title: Trump’s border czar is pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately

item.title: With latest Minnesota fraud case looming, lead prosecutors have quit
item.description: The four prosecutors who spearheaded a $250 million Minnesota fraud case have all left the U.S. Attorney's Office in a growing wave of resignations.

item.title: Nancy Guthrie disappeared from an Arizona neighborhood that is dark at night, quiet and spread out

item.title: Man who tried to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course gets life in prison

item.title: EEOC investigating Nike over alleged discrimination against White workers
item.description: The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission said Nike may have engaged in "a pattern or practice of disparate treatment against White employees."

item.title: Trump says the lesson from Minneapolis is to use a "softer touch" in immigration enforcement
item.description: President Trump told NBC News the call to remove 700 immigration officers from Minneapolis came from him.

item.title: No suspect identified in disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mom
item.description: The disappearance of "Today" show co-host Savannah Guthrie's mother, Nancy Guthrie, is being investigated as a crime.

item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Trump says admin could use a 'softer touch' on immigration
item.description: President Donald Trump said that he learned his administration could "use a softer touch" on immigration.
